content: is an edi address an Identifier or a Contact?
I like that better. Is it a recommendation or a question?
I'm not sure there's a single answer, just wanted to expose it as another option. What makes the most sense will depend on what you're trying to accomplsih
The identifier used to route an EDI message to the recipient. I see it called a "payer ID" on some web pages, but that seemed a little underspecified.
You mean in X12? in the ISA segment or somewhere else?
It is used in 270/271. I presume it would be in the header.
What would be the address url for an edi payor id? The VAN company site?
